head.supplied: ¶ After His Majesty, the King of Württemberg, on this day deigned to confer the Knight's Cross of His Highness's Order of the Württemberg Crown on the Director of the Botanic and Zoological Gardens i...

div.p: RB MSS, MS M200a8, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

seg.seg: Nachdem Seine Majestät der König von Württemberg

p.seg: dem Direktor des botanischen und zoologischen Gartens in Melbourne in Australien,
das Ritterkreuz Höchst Ihres Ordens der Württembergischen Krone

seg.seg: unter dem heutigen Tage zu verleihen geruht haben so ist nach höchstem Befehle Seiner Königlichen Majestät

p.seg: dem Herrn Direktor Dr von Müller

seg.seg: hierüber die gegenwärtige Urkunde ausgestellt worden.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: After His Majesty, the King of Württemberg, on this day deigned to confer the Knight's Cross of His Highness's Order of the Württemberg Crown on the Director of the Botanic and Zoological Gardens in Melbourne in Australia,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: the present certificate for this has been issued to the Director, Dr von Mueller, in accordance with the highest command of His Royal Majesty.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
